name: barrel-api-tests
description: Automated API tests for Barrel API

scripts.test:log: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const logDir = 'logs'; if (!fs.existsSync(logDir)) fs.mkdirSync(logDir); const ts = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:T]/g,'-').split('.')[0]; const logFile = `${logDir}/test-results-${ts}.log`; const out = spawnSync('npx', ['jest', '--runInBand'], { stdio: ['ignore','pipe','pipe'], shell: true }); fs.writeFileSync(logFile, out.stdout + out.stderr); process.stdout.write(out.stdout + out.stderr);"
